title: Where was the first stock exchange in the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Amsterdam Stock Exchange was the world's first official (formal) stock exchange when it began trading the VOC's freely transferable securities, including bonds and shares of stock.

In Amsterdam. It was established by the Dutch East India Company (Verenigde Oostindische Compagnie or VOC) back in 1602. You can learn more about how it became a modern security market here: https://pure.uva.nl/ws/files/1427391/85961_thesis.pdf
